Question: TANGRAM CO., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tangram CO., Ltd.

HiFi 3D Sensor

- Uses ams Mira220 cameras with a 136° field of view 2-megapixel global shutter IR stereo pair and a 136° field of view 2-megapixel RGB camera
- Depth range from 0.3m to 5m with 30-60 frames per second
- 8 TOPS of machine learning processing power for on-sensor fusion of AI and 3D data
- 8GB of onboard memory for running neural networks
- Equipped with Tangram’s sensor software tools for self-calibration, time sync, and uptime management
